acceptance_criteria: Submitting DEPOSIT, WITHDRAWAL, DIVIDEND, or INTEREST without a price succeeds and records a cash-only entry; price input stays hidden for these types.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/Transactions.integration.test.jsx → \hides the price input for cash-only types and accepts submissions without a price\"."
planned_diff_hint: Update TransactionsTab validation/UI for cash-only types; adjust computed shares; document behavior in README (already references cash-only workflow).
title: Enable cash-only transaction submissions
evidence: Vitest integration test covers cash-only submissions; TransactionsTab enforces CASH_ONLY_TYPES guard.

acceptance_criteria: README and UI state that importer support is pending and document the supported API upload workflow.
tests(required): Docs only – manual verification of README + Reports tab copy.
planned_diff_hint: Revise README bulk import section, highlight API ingestion path, and add Reports tab tip pointing to the guidance.
title: Clarify importer availability
evidence: README bulk import section and Reports tab tips flag importer as upcoming and direct users to the API workflow.

acceptance_criteria: Portfolio Controls shows friendly error copy mapped from API codes and includes request IDs.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/PortfolioControls.test.jsx → \maps API errors to friendly copy and surfaces request IDs\"; \"falls back to generic messaging for unexpected failures\"."
planned_diff_hint: Error mapping helper exercised via component tests capturing 403 + 503 flows; banner surfaces request IDs for compliance traceability.
title: Friendly Portfolio Controls errors
evidence: Component tests verify friendly error messages and request IDs; formatControlError normalises responses.

acceptance_criteria: When fetchPrices fails the UI surfaces an error banner and retains last known valuations.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/App.pricing.test.jsx → \retains previous prices and surfaces an alert when refresh fails\"."
planned_diff_hint: Pricing effect preserves last known quotes, emits a banner with request ID, and regression covered by dedicated test harness.
title: Preserve prices on fetch failures
evidence: Vitest pricing test ensures alerts fire and prices persist when fetchPrices fails; priceAlert includes impacted tickers.

acceptance_criteria: Admin dashboard refreshes monitoring, security, events, and NAV data automatically using VITE_ADMIN_POLL_INTERVAL_MS cadence.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/AdminTab.test.jsx → \auto refresh honours the configured poll interval\"."
planned_diff_hint: Attach interval-driven refresh keyed off env-configured poll interval; ensure cleanup on unmount.
title: Admin auto-refresh cadence
evidence: AdminTab timer test covers polling cadence; component respects VITE_ADMIN_POLL_INTERVAL_MS and clears interval on cleanup.

acceptance_criteria: Portfolio settings persist with portfolio payload and hydrate across devices.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/App.settingsPersistence.test.jsx → \saves preferences with the portfolio payload and hydrates them on load\"."
planned_diff_hint: Save/load flows assert preferences + autoClip fields persist with portfolio JSON and round-trip from retrieve endpoint.
title: Persist settings cross-device
evidence: Settings persistence test validates portfolio payload merge; App.jsx normalises and saves settings with portfolio.

acceptance_criteria: Fallback ROI builder ignores cash-only entries lacking tickers and preserves holdings valuations.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/roi.test.js → \skips price fetches for transactions without tickers\"."
planned_diff_hint: Normalize tickers before ROI price fetch; guard share accumulator when ticker missing.
title: Filter undefined ticker requests
evidence: ROI tests confirm undefined tickers are filtered; pricing loader maps only valid tickers before calling fetchPrices.

acceptance_criteria: Admin dashboard surfaces stale nightly pricing warnings when NAV snapshots flag stale_price=true.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/AdminTab.test.jsx → \surfaces stale pricing warnings from NAV snapshot\"."
planned_diff_hint: Render stale pricing badge using latest NAV snapshot metadata and ensure request IDs persist.
title: Surface stale nightly pricing
evidence: AdminTab tests assert stale_price badge toggles; nav snapshot card displays timestamps and request IDs.

acceptance_criteria: When ROI API fails, UI displays fallback banner with request ID and marks dashboard status as fallback ROI.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/App.roiFallback.test.jsx → \alerts when ROI API fails and fallback math is used\"."
planned_diff_hint: Surface ROI fallback banner with request ID and status pill when API errors occur; rely on local recompute.
title: Alert on ROI fallback
evidence: ROI fallback test ensures alert appears with request IDs; App.jsx sets roiAlert and fallback data source.

acceptance_criteria: Compliance can export security events CSV from Admin tab including metadata fields.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/reports.test.js → \serialises security events with request metadata\"; manual UI click path verified."
planned_diff_hint: Add export button wiring to CSV helper covering metadata serialization.

acceptance_criteria: Performance CSV export includes portfolio, SPY, blended, ex-cash, cash, and spread columns.
tests(required): Vitest: src/__tests__/reports.test.js → \includes benchmark series columns in the header and rows\"."
